name: akamai-nginx
description: generate nginx config from akamai property

scripts.test: npm run build && EDGEGRID_ENV=test cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --timeout 10000 --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill ./dist/test/*.spec.js ./dist/test/**/*.spec.js
scripts.test-integration: npm run docker-start && npm run build && EDGEGRID_ENV=test node ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --timeout 10000 --require babel-core/register --require babel-polyfill ./dist/test/**/*.spec-int.js
scripts.build: npm run lint && rimraf dist/ && babel ./src --out-dir dist/src --copy-files && babel ./test --out-dir dist/test --copy-files && babel ./*.js --out-dir dist/ --copy-files
scripts.start: npm run build && AKA_MODE=PAPI node dist/start.js
scripts.start-local: npm run build && AKA_MODE=LOCAL node dist/start.js
scripts.generate-certs: openssl req -x509 -sha256 -nodes -days 365 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout ssl/nginx.key -out ssl/nginx.crt -subj "/C=AU/ST=NSW/L=Sydney/O=ACME Tech Inc/CN=www.site.test"

author: Andrew Vaughan <av@zoto.io> (https://halt.sh)
